mapper.update: update T_ACCOUNT set ACC_FUND=ACC_FUND+#{transFund} WHERE ACC_NO=#{accIn}
update T_ACCOUNT set ACC_FUND=ACC_FUND-#{transFund}-#{fee} WHERE ACC_NO=#{accOut}
mapper.insert: insert into T_TRANSFER(deal_no, deal_date, trans_type, trans_status, acc_out, acc_outname, acc_outbank, acc_in, acc_inname, acc_inbank, currency, trans_fund, kind) values(#{dealNo},#{dealDate},#{transType},#{transStatus},#{accOut},#{accOutName},#{accOutBank},#{accIn}, #{accInName},#{accInBank},#{currency},#{transFund},#{kind})
mapper.select: select ACC_FUND from T_ACCOUNT where ACC_NO=#{accNo}
select BANK_NAME from T_BANK where BANKID=(select ACC_BANKID from T_ACCOUNT where ACC_NO=#{accNo})
select USER_NAME from T_USER where USER_ID=(select USER_ID from T_ACCOUNT where ACC_NO=#{accNo})
mapper.update: update T_TRANSFER set TRANS_STATUS='成功' where DEAL_NO=#{dealNo}
mapper.select: select DEAL_NO dealNo, DEAL_DATE dealDate, TRANS_TYPE transType, TRANS_STATUS transStatus, ACC_OUT accOut, ACC_OUTNAME accOutName, ACC_OUTBANK accOutBank, ACC_IN accIn, ACC_INNAME accInName, ACC_INBANK accInBank, CURRENCY currency, TRANS_FUND transFund,KIND kind from T_TRANSFER WHERE trans_Status = '0' AND TRANS_TYPE = 2

select DEAL_NO dealNo, DEAL_DATE dealDate, TRANS_TYPE transType, TRANS_STATUS transStatus, ACC_OUT accOut, ACC_OUTNAME accOutName, ACC_OUTBANK accOutBank, ACC_IN accIn, ACC_INNAME accInName, ACC_INBANK accInBank, CURRENCY currency, TRANS_FUND transFund,KIND kind from T_TRANSFER WHERE trans_Status = '0' AND TRANS_TYPE = 1
select ACC_LIMIT from T_ACCOUNT where ACC_NO=#{accNo}
select ACC_STATUS from T_ACCOUNT where ACC_NO=#{accNo}
